mapper.insert: insert /** qms.AdmMnuPgm.insert */ into ADM_MNU_PGM( MNU_PGM_ID, PRNT_MNU_ID, MNU_PGM_NM, MNU_PGM_ORD_NO, MNU_PGM_URL_HTML, MNU_PGM_RMK, POPUP_FLG, MNU_TP_CD, MNU_FLG, MNU_USD, DELT_STS_FLG, PJT_ID, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt ) values( #{mnuPgmId}, #{prntId}, #{mnuPgmNm}, #{mnuPgmOrdNo}, #{mnuPgmUrl}, #{mnuPgmRmk}, #{popupFlg}, #{mnuType}, #{mnuFlag}, #{mnuUsd}, #{deltStsFlg}, #{pjtId}, #{createUser}, sysdate, #{updateUser}, sysdate )
mapper.update:
update /** qms.AdmMnuPgm.update */ ADM_MNU_PGM set
MNU_PGM_ID = #{mnuPgmId},
PRNT_MNU_ID = #{prntId},
MNU_PGM_NM = #{mnuPgmNm},
MNU_PGM_ORD_NO = #{mnuPgmOrdNo},
MNU_PGM_URL_HTML = #{mnuPgmUrl},
MNU_PGM_RMK = #{mnuPgmRmk},
POPUP_FLG = #{popupFlg},
MNU_TP_CD = #{mnuType},
MNU_FLG = #{mnuFlag},
MNU_USD = #{mnuUsd},
DELT_STS_FLG = #{deltStsFlg},
upd_usr_id = #{updateUser}, upd_dt = sysdate where 1 = 1 and MNU_PGM_ID = #{mnuPgmId}
